IllegalTargetException - Exception in adrenaline.exceptions
This exception is thrown when a player tries to hit other players that are not reachable with the weapon's effect.

IllegalUseOfPowerUpException - Exception in adrenaline.exceptions
This exception is thrown when a player uses a power up effect in the wrong way.
